thread.title: China’s ‘Heavy Hand’ With Anbang Rattles Some Analysts

author: James T. Areddy
title: China’s ‘Heavy Hand’ With Anbang Rattles Some Analysts
text:
SHANGHAI—When Anbang Insurance Group Co. paid about $2 billion to buy New York City’s Waldorf Astoria Hotel three years ago, the deal seemed to define an era for China Inc. President Xi Jinping shortly afterward dropped in to stay at the Park Avenue landmark.

China’s business priorities have since changed, turning real-estate trophies into symbols of risk. Regulators in Beijing on Friday said they seized control of Anbang to keep the privately held insurer from collapsing, while prosecutors in Shanghai said they indicted Wu...
